title: New champion Names??
body: I was looking at the new champ today wondering about hes name and was like what would happen, if we have a champion called Moter. As Moter means model so we could a new champ called Moter as if its alt spinnes out and has a sort of sun from the sky as diana would have brother. IF YOU SEE TELL ME IF YOU WANT ME TO DRAW WHAT IM THINKING{{champion:131}} {{summoner:6}} {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

replies.body: Banana I do see where your coming from thanks for the info :0
I actually think it'd be really cool if Riot used some unique names that are modern or futuristic, like the one you suggested - I understand if it doesn't fit with their theme tho.
